citations.narrative:
The facility did not properly secure an adult big brown bat in an enclosure. On March 17, 2024, the big brown bat
"Gomez" was found deceased in a sink adjacent to the enclosure in a container that contained water. The facility states
that they did not close the zipper doorway to the enclosure and the animal was able to escape, flew into the bowl, and
subsequently drowned. Failure to ensure an animal is adequately secured can result in their distress, non-recovery, injury
or death. Correct by ensuring that the handling of all animals is done as expeditiously and carefully as possible in a
manner that does not cause trauma, behavioral stress, physical harm or unnecessary discomfort. Correct by 13-JUNE-
2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
